channel.title: Weird shop glitch tingy?
channel.description:
k, so i made a shop with all kinds of bronze items mainly going to be used for noobs....
So i added all of the ID's And it look like this:
[code]shop = 8 Bronze_Shop 1 1 1155 10 1117 10 1075 10 1087 10 1189 10 1205 10 1237 10 1291 10 1307 10 1321 10 1375 10 4119 10 0882 10 [/code]
So all of its added correctly, the NPC works, etc. So when i trade the NPC, at the top it says "Bronze Shop" But theres no items in the shop!!
What did i do incorrectly?

item.title: Weird shop glitch tingy?
item.dc:creator: @Jono22 Jono22
item.description:
@Jono22 wrote:

I wonder if you have to add a price, i may be wrong. Maybe, if you add that, it may work. Also, when your done saving all your edits, don’t forget to compile your server.

Hope this works.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird shop glitch tingy?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Well from the looks of it if you ask me, did you press the space bar and not use tab?

[code]shop = 8 Bronze_Shop 1 1 1155 10 1117 10 1075 10 1087 10 1189 10 1205 10 1237 10 1291 10 1307 10 1321 10 1375 10 4119 10 0882 10[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Weird shop glitch tingy?
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

k, so i made a shop with all kinds of bronze items
mainly going to be used for noobs…

So i added all of the ID’s
And it look like this:

shop = 8	Bronze_Shop					1	1	1155     10     1117     10     1075     10     1087     10     1189     10     1205     10     1237     10     1291     10     1307     10     1321     10     1375     10     4119     10     0882     10

So all of its added correctly, the NPC works, etc.
So when i trade the NPC, at the top it says “Bronze Shop”
But theres no items in the shop!!

What did i do incorrectly?
